title: Dave Engelman
description:
We invite Dave Engelman @PorscheDave09 into the studio this week to talk all things Porsche.  Dave is the Communications Manager for Porsche North America and is an all around knowledgeable car guy.  This week we cover...

  • The new 911 GT3 (991)
  • The Porsche Macan
  • "Over Revs"
  • PDK and dual clutch transmissions in general.
  • Diesel Technology.
  • The Cayenne
  • 4.0 Liter Caymans
  • Singer 911s
  • Magnus Walker
  • the Road & Track reboot
  • VW A.G. and where Porsche fits into the mix.
  • The Porsche Experience Center in Carson California
  • How to get a job in the car industry.
  • And of course the Panamera.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
